Address.label: Address
Address.value: 275 FRANK TOMPA DRIVE, WATERLOO, Ontario, N2L 0A1, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Open Text Corp grew out of a technology project involving the Oxford English Dictionary at Canada's University of Waterloo in the mid-1980s. Its software allows clients to archive, aggregate, retrieve, and search unstructured information (such as documents, e-mail, presentations). The company is based in Ontario, Canada.

value.name: Mark J. Barrenechea
value.title: Vice Chairman, Chief Executive Officer & CTO
